name: news-aggregator
description: A web service that scrapes news sites and shows top articles using React and TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/build frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.type-check: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npx tsc --noEmit
